body.name: Vesgantti Twin Mattress, 10 Inch Hybrid Twin Size Mattress in a Box, Single Bed Pillow Top Mattress, Gel Memory Foam and Pocket Coils Innerspring Mattresses, Pressure Relief, Medium Firm Feel
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 36 mins
features: 【Medium-Firm Plush Feel】- Fully expanded 75 *39*10 inch(LWH) approx. Vesgantti luxury mutilayer foam and pocket spring support systerm provide medium firm yet comfortable feel. A great relief for those suffering from back and neck pains

【Individual Pocket Spring】- Innovative zoned support system constructed by hundreds of individual pocketed stainless spring coils, each spring work independently to offer an all-over and even support to 7 parts of your body (Feet, legs, hips, waist, shoulders, neck, head). Excellent shock-absorption and resilience, cater your vertebra well, help adjust and correct your sleeping posture
【Breathable and Healthy】- Designed with multi-layer foams, comfortable and breathable, providing good air circulation to dissipate sweat and moisture to keep body comfortable and dry when sleeping
【Ultra Quite】- Due to the pocket spring + multilayer foams design, this mattress can effectively absorb noise and vibration; No waken up caused by tossing and turning, no disturbing companion

【Vacuum Rolled Packed】- Delivery: vacuum sealed and neatly rolled in a box. Make sure no one is stanting at the direction where the mattress is rolling out to prevent any unnecessary injury. Smaller size, easy to carry, restore in 10 seconds after unpacking, fully expanded for 72 hours. (Please note: once the mattress open and restore, it cannot be roll back again)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mattress is amazingly comfortable and large. It was bought for the master bedroom in our AirBnB. Very sturdy. Questioned how it would be when it came all rolled up in an air sealed bag. But make sure to have it positioned when you cut the bag as it expands quickly. We have box springs underneath mattress purchased separately. Could not get such quality from a box store esp with this price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive stability and quality!!!
reviews.reviewText: I must say. I’m something of a mattress snob due to my poor back. This mattress boasted medium-firm and is spot on. I opened it and let it completely decompress over about 4 days. I recommend the same. It allows the hybrid coils to fully expand.This is one of the most comfortable mattresses I’ve ever purchased and at this price point it’s quite impressive. Now…it is on a wood slatted platform with a brand new box spring. Together they are doing a great job. I’ve only had it about a month so let’s see how long it stays solid and in full support (without the over time sagging etc)!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good purchase for the price
reviews.reviewText: I love it !!Very comfortableI like that the material don’t make me sweat at night, like those memory foam mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice but affordable mattress for the guest room. Super comfy. It’s a bit on the soft squishy side but still plenty of support. I don’t know how it would stand up to daily use, but our guest stayed for five nights and loved it.We used it without a box spring which adds to firmness but it was still very plush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't beat the quality and price!
reviews.reviewText: We wanted to put an XL Twin in the 3rd bedroom that's also used as an office. Looking around at brick/mortar stores the prices were crazy! Rickety frames were over $100 and mattresses started at $260. I decided to look at Amazon and boy was there a difference! I bought a good quality steel frame with slats (so wouldn't need box spring) for $50 that's rated at 2500 lbs! This mattress, with sale, was $180. We were VERY leery of buying a "bed in a box" mattress but it's really nice! Firm with a subtle thin pillow top that makes it very comfortable overall. Considering everything these days is made to be disposable, mattresses don't last past a few years anyway. We would much rather buy at these prices than pay double for same quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have consistently purchased mattresses well over $1000 throughout my life. Ordered this one for the guest bedroom because I didn't want to invest a whole lot -- just keeping it simple and functional. Well.. this mattress is beyond what I expected! It's insanely comfortable. My (mattress-picky) people love this bed so much! Everyone sleeps like a dream. Even my mom who has crazy bad back problems.Get this! Just do it! You will not regret

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t last long
reviews.reviewText: At first we were thrilled with this mattress. It was soft and easy to assemble (just open the bag)However after only a few months, you can feel the springs through the layers and they dig into your body (shoulders, back, and hips).This is very disappointing- the mattress should have lasted years not months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE - 10 days inNot only has the mattress not flattened itself out (the top half is noticeably taller/firmer than the bottom), but the "padding" that is supposedly several inches thick is also barely attached - it's already coming up in the middle.It's uncomfortable, my back hurts more every night, and the quality is abysmal. What a rip-off. Going to see if someone locally wants it for a spare room where it won't cause chronic back pain, and I'mjust going to buy a better mattress and eat the cost.DO NOT BUY THIS JUNK.---It's my first night with the mattress, and I can already tell that it is not what the pictures would lead you to believe. I don't know where all these supposed layers of foam and padding are - I can feel the springs on the side of the mattress and they go all the way up to the quilted layer. Sitting on it I can feel individual springs in some spots. Sitting on the edge I can feel the springs on the sides bending outward instead of straight down - there does not seem to be any real structure to keep the springs under control. Even my full memory foam mattress didn't sink this much on the edges.Will update after a few nights sleeping on it, but so far I am not impressed.I'll give it a couple nights to see if the sleeping experience is any better
it is worth paying for , i have been using this for 7 months and i have 2 kids who are all the time playing it on , but this is just as it was the day one , no change.

I have slept on this mattress for one week now and can honestly say I have slept better than I have in a long time! I have found ZERO difference between my old mattress and this one. It is not plush by any means but it is not hard as rock either. I suffer from chronic pain and this has in no way made it worse. I am very happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewTitle: Not as soft as I was expecting
reviews.reviewText: Nice looking mattress. It's not as comfortable as I was hoping.

J’adore ce matelas. Au début mon dos avait de la difficulté à s’habituer mais au bout de qq jours mon corps s’est senti en harmonie avec le matelas. Douceur et pas trop ferme. Je dors des nuits paisibles et en sécurité. Le matin je sens que mon corps a profité pleinement de la qualité d’un bon matelas. Je le recommande..

Love this mattress! Did a bunch of research and found this one. So easy to set up! Firm feel and support but the pillowtop makes it really comfortable! Been sleeping on it for almost a month and have loved it from the first night!
